attributes.action: Close down schools because covid 19 is becoming more lethal
attributes.additional_details: Because more and more kids will die if we do not take action against this and a lot of people are getting sick in schools it's getting to fatal and soon a lot of people will begin dying due to covid Scotland already closed down some schools so we should too.
attributes.background: I want them to take action against covid and to shut down the schools last time it happened it worked just fine and online learning is note effective than real learning for example platanos college students have achieved high grades this term due to online learning
